Description of incident: The Nazareth Area School District notified parents of a data breach when a student accessed students records without authorization and put student information on a flash drive."The letter dated April 29 went home to district parents from Superintendent Dennis Riker. Riker says in the letter a student accessed the private data between December 2011 and April 2014 and put it on a flash drive."The information compromised included student names, addresses, phone numbers, dates of birth, student ID's and parents names.More Information: http://www.lehighvalleylive.com/nazareth/index.ssf/2016/05/find_out_what...
